snippet: Security experts say it is becoming difficult to trust the organizations that guarantee a Web site is authentic.

headline.main: Experts Warn of a Weak Link in the Security of Web Sites
headline.print_headline: Experts Warn of a Weak Link in the Security of Web Sites

snippet: James Rosenbloom, one of the most likable bridge-playing New Yorkers, died on July 31 at 56 after a long battle with cancer.

headline.main: West Dangles a Fatal Finesse Before Declarer, but in Vain
headline.print_headline: West Dangles a Fatal Finesse Before Declarer, but in Vain

snippet: When top technology execs were polled about H.P.'s future, they said the company should hire from within and stay the course.
abstract: When top technology execs were polled about H.P.'s future, they said the company should hire from within and stay the course.

headline.main: Survey Says: Next H.P. CEO to Come From H.P. or I.B.M.
